remarks: The value of partial isomorphism B is a subspace of partial vector space H. TODO: use dib* specific theorems instead of dia* ones to shorten proof?  (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2014.)
statement:
diblss.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diblss.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diblss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diblss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
diblss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) e. S ) $.
